hacktree

Create Your Link-in-Bio Page

Build and showcase your personal link tree using fastn.

Get Started

Get Started

1

Clone or fork the hacktree.in repository.

2

Create a folder with your name and add your fastn webpage code.

3

Create a Pull Request (PR) to merge your changes.

4

Once merged, your link-in-bio page goes live!
